long_description: The fitted Sugoi Carbon T-shirt for women performs well as a warm base layer for any activity thanks to its moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric that helps keep your skin dry. Double jersey knit provides all-way stretch; interior is brushed for softness and insulation. Antimicrobial carbon fibers in fabric deter odors. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. Sugoi Carbon top for women offers a close-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: The fitted Sugoi Carbon T-shirt for women performs well as a warm base layer for any activity thanks to its moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric that helps keep your skin dry.
